title: Logitech G910 Problems with League.
body:
Has anyone found this issue with the G910... you hold space bar to center your camera, you hold it down, as you go to make a move, suddenly, you can't press any keys, the screen starts to lag, your mouse lags, then a 4-6 beeps happen and then bam, its all okay again.
I've tried turning on filter keys so it doesnt repeat keystrokes if i hold a keydown, ive tried it with the filter keys off. ive tried it with all the things, and I dont understand how to fix this, but it gives me 1-2 seconds of no response on my keyboard, and then i die... usually.
HALP!

replies.body:
Right click your keyboard/mouse software running in background, exit it while you play.

Problem fixed.

Sounds like a stickykeys problem or something similar.


go to control panel -> ease of access centre -> Make the keyboard easier to use -> uncheck the boxes.


Can you describe the sounds it makes?
